LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice10.label: Momi⇒Brown rice(10)
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice10.description: Momi is divided into Brown rice and Outher hull.
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice50.label: Momi⇒Brown rice(50)
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice50.description: Momi is divided into Brown rice and Outher hull.
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice10_1.label: Polite Momi⇒Brown rice(10)
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice10_1.description: Momi is divided into Brown rice and Outher hull.\nBy doing it politely you can earn a small amount of white rice.
